backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing inquiries and user profiles with admin-guarded CRUD operations using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS theme variables defining colors, radii, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading the Vite bundle.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to root for client-side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Admin HTML entrypoint mounting the React app for the /admin path.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component configuring SPA routing and rendering AdminPage when the official login session is active.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Provides inquiry action menu for marking read/unread, deleting, and exporting inquiries with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Displays inquiries with filters, timestamps, metadata, and integrates InquiryActions for managing each item.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: Login dialog allowing officials to authenticate using user ID and password with error handling.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the Vaishnavi brand image with configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing business info, disclaimer, copyright, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Validated inquiry submission form posting inquiries via React Query with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, section scrolling, and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders business contact details including address, operator, phone, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Section containing a card wrapper for the main inquiry form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with business details, call/WhatsApp buttons, and an admin login dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a services section displaying categories and items from siteContent using responsive cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays a grid of reasons to choose the service, sourced from siteContent with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides structured content for business info, hero text, services, reasons, and footer data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Hooks for fetching, deleting, and updating inquiry read status through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and providing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Implements a simple session-based admin login system using hardcoded credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting inquiries to the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom HSL theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that restricts access via official login and displays, manages, and exports inquiries.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Provides helpers to convert inquiries to JSON or CSV, including CSV escaping, timestamp formatting, and localized labels, then triggers client-side file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, container settings, extended utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, admin login requirements, architectural notes, and existing features with versioned state info.
